overview:
Howard Watson is a Chartered Accountant with over 23 years experience in finance including leading numerous IPOs. Howard has 13 years experience in the security industry, the last 11 years as CEO of Signature Security and the previous 2 years as CFO of Signature.

Howard has directed over 80 acquisitions, including the integration of financial, sales, operational and human resource systems and procedures making Signature one of the leaders in the security industry in Australia and New Zealand. He has a proven track record in building profitable sustainable business models. He has led numerous fundraising projects including equity, senior bank facilities and subordinated facilities.
